verses.verse: Then <S%H5066>came<s%> <S%H5066>near<s%> the <S%H7218>heads<s%> of the <S%H1>fathers<s%> of the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> to <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> and to <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5126>Nun,<s%> and to the <S%H7218>heads<s%> of the <S%H1>fathers<s%> of the <S%H4294>tribes<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%>

And they <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to them at <S%H7887>Shiloh<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> by the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H4872>Moses<s%> to <S%H5414>give<s%> us <S%H5892>cities<s%> to <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in, with the <S%H4054>suburbs<s%> thereof for our <S%H929>cattle.<s%>

And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> to the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> out of their <S%H5159>inheritance,<s%> <S%H413>at<s%> the <S%H6310>commandment<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> and their <S%H4054>suburbs.<s%>

And the <S%H1486>lot<s%> <S%H3318>came<s%> out for the <S%H4940>families<s%> of the <S%H6956>Kohathites:<s%> and the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron<s%> the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> which were of the <S%H3881>Levites,<s%> <S%H1961>had<s%> by <S%H1486>lot<s%> out of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and out of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H8099>Simeon,<s%> and out of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin,<s%> <S%H7969>thirteen<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H5892>cities.<s%>

And the <S%H3498>rest<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H6955>Kohath<s%> had by <S%H1486>lot<s%> out of the <S%H4940>families<s%> of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim,<s%> and out of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H1835>Dan,<s%> and out of the <S%H2677>half<s%> <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh,<s%> <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H5892>cities.<s%>

And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1647>Gershon<s%> had by <S%H1486>lot<s%> out of the <S%H4940>families<s%> of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H3485>Issachar,<s%> and out of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H836>Asher,<s%> and out of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H5321>Naphtali,<s%> and out of the <S%H2677>half<s%> <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> in <S%H1316>Bashan,<s%> <S%H7969>thirteen<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H5892>cities.<s%>

The <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H4847>Merari<s%> by their <S%H4940>families<s%> had out of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben,<s%> and out of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad,<s%> and out of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H2074>Zebulun,<s%> <S%H8147>twelve<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H5892>cities.<s%>

And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> by <S%H1486>lot<s%> to the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> with their <S%H4054>suburbs,<s%> as the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> by the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H4872>Moses.<s%>

And they <S%H5414>gave<s%> out of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and out of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H8095>Simeon,<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> are here <S%H7121>mentioned<s%> by <S%H8034>name.<s%>

Which the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> being of the <S%H4940>families<s%> of the <S%H6956>Kohathites,<s%> who were of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3878>Levi,<s%> <S%H1961>had:<s%> for <S%H1992>theirs<s%> was the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H1486>lot.<s%>

And they <S%H5414>gave<s%> them the <S%H7151>city<s%> of <S%H704>Arba<s%> the <S%H1>father<s%> of <S%H6061>Anak,<s%> <S%H1958>which<s%> city is <S%H2275>Hebron,<s%> in the <S%H2022>hill<s%> country of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> with the <S%H4054>suburbs<s%> thereof <S%H5439>round<s%> about it.

But the <S%H7704>fields<s%> of the <S%H5892>city,<s%> and the <S%H2691>villages<s%> thereof, <S%H5414>gave<s%> they to <S%H3612>Caleb<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3312>Jephunneh<s%> for his <S%H272>possession.<s%>

Thus they <S%H5414>gave<s%> to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> <S%H2275>Hebron<s%> with her <S%H4054>suburbs,<s%> to be a <S%H5892>city<s%> of <S%H4733>refuge<s%> for the <S%H7523>slayer;<s%> and <S%H3841>Libnah<s%> with her <S%H4054>suburbs,<s%>
And <S%H3492>Jattir<s%> with her <S%H4054>suburbs,<s%> and <S%H851>Eshtemoa<s%> with her <S%H4054>suburbs,<s%>
And <S%H2473>Holon<s%> with her <S%H4054>suburbs,<s%> and <S%H1688>Debir<s%> with her <S%H4054>suburbs,<s%>

And <S%H5871>Ain<s%> with her <S%H4054>suburbs,<s%> and <S%H3194>Juttah<s%> with her <S%H4054>suburbs,<s%> and <S%H1053>Bethshemesh<s%> with her <S%H4054>suburbs;<s%> <S%H8672>nine<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> out of <S%H428>those<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H7626>tribes.<s%>
And out of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin,<s%> <S%H1391>Gibeon<s%> with her <S%H4054>suburbs,<s%> <S%H1387>Geba<s%> with her <S%H4054>suburbs,<s%>
<S%H6068>Anathoth<s%> with her <S%H4054>suburbs,<s%> and <S%H5960>Almon<s%> with her <S%H4054>suburbs;<s%> <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H5892>cities.<s%>

<S%H3605>All<s%> the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> the <S%H3548>priests,<s%> were <S%H7969>thirteen<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> with their <S%H4054>suburbs.<s%>

And the <S%H4940>families<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H6955>Kohath,<s%> the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> which <S%H3498>remained<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H6955>Kohath,<s%> even they <S%H1961>had<s%> the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of their <S%H1486>lot<s%> out of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim.<s%>

For they <S%H5414>gave<s%> them <S%H7927>Shechem<s%> with her <S%H4054>suburbs<s%> in <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H669>Ephraim,<s%> to be a <S%H5892>city<s%> of <S%H4733>refuge<s%> for the <S%H7523>slayer;<s%> and <S%H1507>Gezer<s%> with her <S%H4054>suburbs,<s%>
And <S%H6911>Kibzaim<s%> with her <S%H4054>suburbs,<s%> and <S%H1032>Bethhoron<s%> with her <S%H4054>suburbs;<s%> <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H5892>cities.<s%>
And out of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H1835>Dan,<s%> <S%H514>Eltekeh<s%> with her <S%H4054>suburbs,<s%> <S%H1405>Gibbethon<s%> with her <S%H4054>suburbs,<s%>
<S%H357>Aijalon<s%> with her <S%H4054>suburbs,<s%> <S%H1667>Gathrimmon<s%> with her <S%H4054>suburbs;<s%> <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H5892>cities.<s%>

And out of the <S%H4276>half<s%> <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh,<s%> <S%H8590>Tanach<s%> with her <S%H4054>suburbs,<s%> and <S%H1667>Gathrimmon<s%> with her <S%H4054>suburbs;<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H5892>cities.<s%>

<S%H3605>All<s%> the <S%H5892>cities<s%> were <S%H6235>ten<s%> with their <S%H4054>suburbs<s%> for the <S%H4940>families<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H6955>Kohath<s%> that <S%H3498>remained.<s%>

And to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1647>Gershon,<s%> of the <S%H4940>families<s%> of the <S%H3881>Levites,<s%> out of the other <S%H2677>half<s%> <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> they gave <S%H1474>Golan<s%> in <S%H1316>Bashan<s%> with her <S%H4054>suburbs,<s%> to be a <S%H5892>city<s%> of <S%H4733>refuge<s%> for the <S%H7523>slayer;<s%> and <S%H1203>Beeshterah<s%> with her <S%H4054>suburbs;<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H5892>cities.<s%>
And out of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H3485>Issachar,<s%> <S%H7191>Kishon<s%> with her <S%H4054>suburbs,<s%> <S%H1705>Dabareh<s%> with her <S%H4054>suburbs,<s%>
<S%H3412>Jarmuth<s%> with her <S%H4054>suburbs,<s%> <S%H5873>Engannim<s%> with her <S%H4054>suburbs;<s%> <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H5892>cities.<s%>
And out of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H836>Asher,<s%> <S%H4861>Mishal<s%> with her <S%H4054>suburbs,<s%> <S%H5658>Abdon<s%> with her <S%H4054>suburbs,<s%>
<S%H2520>Helkath<s%> with her <S%H4054>suburbs,<s%> and <S%H7340>Rehob<s%> with her <S%H4054>suburbs;<s%> <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H5892>cities.<s%>

And out of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H5321>Naphtali,<s%> <S%H6943>Kedesh<s%> in <S%H1551>Galilee<s%> with her <S%H4054>suburbs,<s%> to be a <S%H5892>city<s%> of <S%H4733>refuge<s%> for the <S%H7523>slayer;<s%> and <S%H2576>Hammothdor<s%> with her <S%H4054>suburbs,<s%> and <S%H7178>Kartan<s%> with her <S%H4054>suburbs;<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H5892>cities.<s%>

<S%H3605>All<s%> the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of the <S%H1649>Gershonites<s%> according to their <S%H4940>families<s%> were <S%H7969>thirteen<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> with their <S%H4054>suburbs.<s%>

And to the <S%H4940>families<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H4847>Merari,<s%> the <S%H3498>rest<s%> of the <S%H3881>Levites,<s%> out of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H2074>Zebulun,<s%> <S%H3362>Jokneam<s%> with her <S%H4054>suburbs,<s%> and <S%H7177>Kartah<s%> with her <S%H4054>suburbs,<s%>
<S%H1829>Dimnah<s%> with her <S%H4054>suburbs,<s%> <S%H5096>Nahalal<s%> with her <S%H4054>suburbs;<s%> <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H5892>cities.<s%>
And out of the tribe of <S%H7205>Reuben,<s%> <S%H1221>Bezer<s%> with her <S%H4054>suburbs,<s%> and <S%H3096>Jahazah<s%> with her <S%H4054>suburbs,<s%>
<S%H6932>Kedemoth<s%> with her <S%H4054>suburbs,<s%> and <S%H4158>Mephaath<s%> with her <S%H4054>suburbs;<s%> <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H5892>cities.<s%>

And out of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad,<s%> <S%H7216>Ramoth<s%> in <S%H1568>Gilead<s%> with her <S%H4054>suburbs,<s%> to be a <S%H5892>city<s%> of <S%H4733>refuge<s%> for the <S%H7523>slayer;<s%> and <S%H4266>Mahanaim<s%> with her <S%H4054>suburbs,<s%>
<S%H2809>Heshbon<s%> with her <S%H4054>suburbs,<s%> <S%H3270>Jazer<s%> with her <S%H4054>suburbs;<s%> <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> in <S%H3605>all.<s%>

So <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5892>cities<s%> for the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H4847>Merari<s%> by their <S%H4940>families,<s%> which were <S%H3498>remaining<s%> of the <S%H4940>families<s%> of the <S%H3881>Levites,<s%> were by their <S%H1486>lot<s%> <S%H8147>twelve<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H5892>cities.<s%>

<S%H3605>All<s%> the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> <S%H8432>within<s%> the <S%H272>possession<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> were <S%H705>forty<s%> and <S%H8083>eight<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> with their <S%H4054>suburbs.<s%>
<S%H428>These<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> were every one with their <S%H4054>suburbs<s%> <S%H5439>round<s%> about them: <S%H3651>thus<s%> were <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H5892>cities.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> to <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he <S%H7650>swore<s%> to <S%H5414>give<s%> to their <S%H1>fathers;<s%> and they <S%H3423>possessed<s%> it, and <S%H3427>dwelled<s%> therein.

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> gave them <S%H5117>rest<s%> <S%H5439>round<s%> about, according to <S%H3605>all<s%> that he <S%H7650>swore<s%> to their <S%H1>fathers:<s%> and there <S%H5975>stood<s%> not a <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H341>enemies<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> them; the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5414>delivered<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H341>enemies<s%> into their <S%H3027>hand.<s%>

There <S%H5307>failed<s%> not <S%H1697>ought<s%> of <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H1697>thing<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> had <S%H1696>spoken<s%> to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H935>pass.<s%>
